adjective.description: Fixed or fastened so as not to give way, become loose, or be lost.
examples: check to ensure that all nuts and bolts are secure

verb.description: Fix or attach (something) firmly so that it cannot be moved or lost.
examples: pins secure the handle to the main body

origin: Mid 16th century (in the sense feeling no apprehension): from Latin securus, from se- without + cura care.
